East_Orange.Ahlus Sunnah School:
Ahlus Sunnah School is an Islamic school located in East Orange, New Jersey. Founded in 2005, the school serves students in grades PreK-12.
As of the 2015-16 school year, the school had an enrollment of 230 students (plus 25 in PreK) and 25.8 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 8.9:1.
